Jessie Chisi bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede ihe nkiri nke Zambia.

Ka ọ na-etolite na Zambia, Chisi gara Durban Talent Campus na 2009 ma na 2010 a nabatara ya na Berlinale Talent Campus. Ọ bụ onye enyemaka mmepụta na ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke Rungano Nyoni nke afọ 2011 nke a kpọrọ Mwansa the Great
N'afọ 2013, Chisi guzobere Zambia Short Film Fest, nke na-egosi ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke nkeji iri na ise ma ọ bụ obere.
Chisi's Berlinale pitch, nke a na-akpọ Woman On Hold, mechara bụrụ ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2014 Between Rings, nke Finnish Film Foundation kwadoro
Akụkọ ahụ metụtara nwa nwanne nne Chisi bụ Esther Phiri, nwanyị mbụ na-akụ ọkpọ na Zambia, onye kewara n'etiti alụmdi ya na ọrụ. E gosipụtara ya na Copenhagen International Documentary Festival.

O dere, soro mepụta ma duzie Imagination (2016), banyere nwa okorobịa nọ na Garden Township, Lusaka onye na-arọ nrọ megide ohere nke ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri. Ọ duziri Season 1 & 2 nke Zuba (2018-2019), ihe nkiri mbụ nke Zambia
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, o mepụtara, duzie ma dee Remedy (2020), ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke dabeere na ahụmịhe Zambia n'oge ọrịa COVID-19.
Ọ biri ma rụọ ọrụ na Finland.
